definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: husband's father (NH id., of husband's or wife's father, so Aram. [[חֲמָא]]; Ar.h.amun husband's male relation (father, brother, paternal uncle), but also wife's father, etc.; Eth. h.am: As. êmû, Zim:BP 48);—only sf. [[חָמִ֫יךָ]] Ge 38:13, Ge 38:25, of Judah as Tamar's father-in-law; [[חָמִיהָ]] 1Sa 4:19, 1Sa 4:21 of Eli, father-in-law of Phinehas' wife.
